archimate:Requirement.name: Enable technical, operational and organizational measures to manage risks to prevent or minimize the impact of incidents on services
archimate:Requirement.documentation: Member States shall ensure that essential and important entities take appropriate and proportionate technical, operational and organisational measures to manage the risks posed to the security of network and information systems which those entities use for their operations or for the provision of their services, and to prevent or minimise the impact of incidents on recipients of their services and on other services
